name: Legor 3 - Free Puzzle Brain Game
description:
Popular award winning puzzle game Legor is back with 15 brand new levels! Can you solve them all?

The formula is still the same, build various shapes in this challenging high-scores puzzle game, but now with even harder levels! The game has 15 levels of increasing difficulty! It contains global leaderboard, so don't forget to submit your score (after each level) to show the world how good you are!

How to play: Press and drag the shape to move it, press on the part of the shape with the black arrow to rotate it! Fill all the empty slots as fast as possible! Your score depends on your speed!

Features:
- 15 levels of increasing difficulty!
- global leaderboards included!
- great puzzle game for the whole family!
- award winning puzzle game
- your progress is saved after each level, so you can continue later
- 100% free full version
